Reviews.Title: batteries and charger
Reviews.Author: Jack A. Wertheimer
Reviews.Content: they came, they seem to work and no problems so far, if and when problems occur, I will report back.

Reviews.Title: So far so good
Reviews.Author: T. Ta "The one and only!"
Reviews.Content: The batteries fit great and the external charger seems to be made well. So far the batteries seem to last just as long as the OEM battery. I can't attest to the longevity of these batteries yet which is why I am giving it only 4 stars. If they last at least a year without losing charge or getting swollen then I will revisit and give it 5 stars.
